name: Radio Waves
description:
C:\> dir
C:\> load "radio_waves.exe"

Welcome CRT01 and CRT02! In our chambers you'll be tested in your puzzle-solving and coordination skills with one another.

During your tests we will have you experiment with a number of experimental mechanics that may or may not result in your untimely demise... Don't let that sway you, however! There's experimentation to be done!

Join me, young subject! Welcome to Radio Waves!

===============================

Radio Waves was a project I started back in October of 2019 involving a few leftover assets from an old project of mine from the previous year. After leaving it dormant for the best part of a year, I picked it back up near the middle of August of 2020 and expanded upon it! I might expand upon this if people like it.

(I don't like asking for money for such small things but I have a humble Uni student. If you can, please throw us a bone and donate! -Emily)
